iti39:2.1: “Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa dve dhammadesana pariyayena bhavanti.
iti39:2.5: ‘papam papakato disva tattha nibbindatha virajjatha vimuccatha’ti—
iti39:2.7: Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa ima dve dhammadesana pariyayena bhavanti”ti.
iti39:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
